term.title: Landolt reaction

item.text: A slow chemical reaction, in which the formation of a product is delayed by a suitable reagent added for the purpose.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2291. 'Nomenclature of kinetic methods of analysis (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2296 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365102291)
